thread.section_title: Mandarin Oriental, Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent!!
thread.title_full: Excellent!! - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ingrid M
title: Excellent!!
text: It was our second stay in this really beautiful hotel. Everything is perfect here.. the friendly staff, the service, the room, the food and even the smell I really love the home fragrance! I also love the personal touch... the small talk with the staff...the handwritten card in your room.... Looking forward to our third stay!
